author: BBC News
description:
Today, we hear from the family of Virginia Giuffre, who became the most prominent victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

In an interview with Laura, they said that Lord Mandelson should never have been given the position of UK ambassador to the United States.

And Business Secretary Peter Kyle told her it was "highly unlikely" Lord Mandelson would have been appointed if the extent of his relationship with Epstein was known to those in government.

We unpack the interview, the government response, and what it means for Keir Starmer.

Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#BBCNews
title: Epstein victim's family speaks out over Mandelson | BBC Newscast

author: BBC News
description:
British boxing champion Ricky Hatton has been found dead at his home aged 46, Greater Manchester Police has said. 
 
There are not currently believed to be any suspicious circumstances, police added. 
 
"There will only ever be one Ricky Hatton," Tyson Fury said, as Amir Khan said Hatton will "always have your place in the ring of our memories".
 
Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#RickyHatton #BBCNews
title: Boxing champion Ricky Hatton found dead aged 46 | BBC News

author: BBC News
description:
The family of Virginia Giuffre, who became the most prominent victim of Jeffrey Epstein, has told the BBC that Lord Mandelson should never have been given the position of UK ambassador to the United States.
 
In an exclusive interview on Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg, Virginia's brother Sky Roberts said the appointment "speaks to how deep the corruption goes in our systems".
 
Business Secretary Peter Kyle told the BBC it was "highly unlikely" Lord Mandelson would have been appointed if the extent of his relationship with Epstein was known to those in government.
 
There is no suggestion that Lord Mandelson ever met Giuffre. He said last week, that "perhaps as a gay man", he never sought or was offered introductions to women from Epstein.
 
Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#BBCNews
title: Lord Mandelson should never have been ambassador, says Epstein victim's family | BBC News

author: BBC News
description:
Neurosurgeons are now using mixed reality technology to prepare for operations.
 
And BBC Tech Now’s Lara Lewington has met the medical teams using immersive tech - such as 3D models of patient scans to practice ahead of operations - to better explain treatment to patients.

title: The immersive technology helping patients and surgeons prepare for operations | BBC News

author: BBC News
description:
United States Secretary of State Marco Rubio has arrived in Israel, where he is set to meet Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
 
It comes as tensions mount in the Middle East over the Israeli attack on Qatar last week,  with an emergency session of the Arab-Islamic summit set for Monday in Doha.  
 
Rubio’s trip comes after US President Donald Trump criticised Israel over the "brazen and failed" attack on Hamas leaders in the Qatari capital.
 
Netanyahu has defended the operation, saying that killing senior Hamas officials would remove the “main obstacle” to ending the war.
 
Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#Israel #Doha #BBCNews
title: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio visits Israel in aftermath of Qatar strikes | BBC News

author: BBC News
description:
Today, we look at how Bloomberg broke the story of Mandelson’s emails to Jeffrey Epstein that got him sacked as US ambassador. And we hear new information about the investigation Keir Starmer carried out into the relationship before appointing him.

Laura and Paddy are joined by Alex Campbell who led the Bloomberg team.

Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#BBCNews
title: The Mandelson-Epstein emails - who knew what, when? | BBC Newscast
